obata eya thuni karaganna melesa sambahanaya kirimen ohuta udaw karanna puluwan. 25.oba tika welawak eliyata yanawa nam ohuge podi badaginna niwanna ohu kamathima kukis ho kek sakas kara thaba yanna. 26.oba premanwitha rathriyak salasum karanne nam, itipandam paththu kara rathriya sandaha rasawath wishesha kamak piliyela kirimen eya thawath wishesha karanna. 27.ohu ketharam shreshta sahakaruweku dayi ohuta kiyanna, ee sadaha hethu penwa denna. 28.ohu gamanak yamata pera ohuge priyathama aadarabara satahanak ohuge bagayata damanna. 29.oba ohu asala wadi wi sitina wita ohuge atha pirimadinna. 30.ohuta nida ganimata ida denna. 31.ohu snanaya karana wita, kadapathehi washpaya matha hurubuhuti satahanak liyanna. 32.kisima hethuwak nomathiwa oba dedena niwasedi wisithuru rathri bhojana sangrahayak piliyela karanna. 33.oba ohu kerehi ketharam aakarshanaya wi athdayi ohuta kiyanna. 34.ohuge kondaya haraha obe dath wala agili thudu mruduwa gaman karawanna. 35.ohu kirimata adahas kara gena siti namuth masa gananak (ho eeta wadi kalayak) athapasu wu yam wadak ho karyayak karanna. 36.ohuta sukhopabhogi nishpadanayak laba denna. 37.ohu rakiyawa gana kanagatuwata path wena wita, ohu kotharam hodin rakiyawa karanawada yannath ohuge sewayojakaya ohu wan sewakayeku labimata kotharam wasanawanthadayi yannath ohuta mathak karanna. 38.idahita oba rakiyawen niwasata paminena athara niwasedi rasawath yamak piliyela kirimata awashya dewal miladi ganna. 39.idala hitala welasanin awadi wi anek wada kirimata pera pankek hari wenath rasawath udasana aaharayak piliyela karanna. 40.ohu wenuwen ohu kamathima diwa aaharaya asurum kara ee samanga aadara satahanak thabanna. 41.ohu katha karana wita sabawinma ohuta sawan denna.
hitapu aarakshaka lekam karunasena hettiaarachchi mahatha janadhipathi lekam karyalayata kandawa athi bawada janapathi karyaliya aaranchimarga sandahan karayi.

me ethumage gunasamaru satahanaki.polgahawela panaliya game upatha lada welagedara mathithuma kolambaa aananda ha nalanda widyalawala adhyapanaya laba aadayam palaka niladhariwarayaku lesa sewayata athulath wi galagedara, ududumbara ha wauda pallihathpaththuwe sewaya ෙkaleya.pasuwa kurunagala nagara sabhawe nagarika manthriwarayaku lesa deshapalanayata piwisi ethuma ema nagara sabhawe nagaradhipathiwaraya lesa karana lada sewaya pasasiya yuthuya.

siddhiya pilibandawa janathawa amathamin je.aar kiwe mema bomba pipirimen thamata kisidu haniyak sidu nowu bawath thama kamisaye aththe thamange le nowana namuth ema kamisaya “smarakayak” lesa thaba gannawa yanuweni.
ithin mema arayata samana digak ema wruththayema paridhiya osse lakunu karagath wita, ema kotasin ema wruththaye kendraye aapathanaya karana konaya rediyan 1k yayi artha dakwa atha.

maha banku adhipathi nihandayi : meya shri lanka maha bankuwe katayuthuwalata angili gasimak bawada me gana wahama maha banku adhipathi aacharya indrajith kumaraswami mahatha awadhanaya yomu kara, maha bankuwa magahara gewim paddhathiyak athi kirimata darana uthsahaya wahama parajaya kala yuthuwa athi bawath, ese nokalahoth mulu ratema pawathina gewim saha piyawim paddhathiya kerehi pawathina mahajana wishwasaya bindawatenu athi bawath ohu kiyathi.
